name: setup.exe
description:
setup.exe is a game hidden inside an installer. It explores the common features of common installers in creative ways promoting short, different and unique game experiences.

We try to approach the game about the unexpected antecipation an installer bring to us when we try to install a game.

We hope you enjoy!

Credits:

Anderson Vermonde Hamilko
